Description_lang: For the next $d, you generate an absorb shield for $s3% of all damage you deal, and Avenger's Shield damage is increased by $s2% and its cooldown is reduced by $s1%.
AuraDescription_lang: Avenger's Shield damage increased by $s2% and cooldown reduced by $s1%. Generating an absorb shield for $s2% of all damage dealt.

description_blz.en_US: For the next 15 sec, you generate an absorb shield for 25% of all damage you deal, and Avenger's Shield damage is increased by 20% and its cooldown is reduced by 75%.
description_blz.es_MX: Durante los próximos 15 s, generas un escudo de absorción equivalente al 25% de todo el daño que infliges. Además, el daño de Escudo de vengador aumenta un 20% y su tiempo de reutilización se reduce un 75%.
description_blz.pt_BR: Pelos próximos 15 s, você gera um escudo de absorção equivalente a 25% de todo o dano que você causa. O dano do Escudo do Vingador aumenta em 20% e a dele é reduzida em 75%.
description_blz.de_DE: Für die nächsten 15 Sek. erzeugt Ihr einen Absorptionsschild in Höhe von 25% des gesamten Schadens, den Ihr verursacht. Außerdem wird der Schaden von 'Schild des Rächers' um 20% erhöht und die Abklingzeit der Fähigkeit um 75% verringert.
description_blz.en_GB: For the next 15 sec, you generate an absorb shield for 25% of all damage you deal, and Avenger's Shield damage is increased by 20% and its cooldown is reduced by 75%.
description_blz.es_ES: Durante los siguientes 15 s, generas un escudo de absorción equivalente al 25% de todo el daño que infliges. El daño de Escudo de vengador aumenta un 20% y su tiempo de reutilización se reduce un 75%.
description_blz.fr_FR: Pendant 15 s, vous générez un bouclier d’absorption d’un montant égal à 25% des dégâts que vous infligez. De plus, les dégâts de Bouclier du vengeur sont augmentés de 20% et son temps de recharge est réduit de 75%.
description_blz.it_IT: Per i successivi 15 s, si genera uno scudo che assorbe danni subiti pari al 25% di tutti i danni inflitti. Inoltre, i danni inflitti da Scudo del Vendicatore aumentano del 20% e il suo tempo di recupero si riduce del 75%.
description_blz.ru_RU: В течение 15 сек. 25% урона, который вы наносите, превращается в поглощающий урон щит. Кроме того, "Щит мстителя" наносит на 20% больше урона, а его время восстановления сокращается на 75%.
description_blz.ko_KR: 다음 15초 동안 입힌 모든 피해의 25%에 해당하는 피해 흡수 보호막을 생성합니다. 또한 응징의 방패의 공격력이 20%만큼 증가하고 재사용 대기시간은 75%만큼 감소합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 在接下來的15秒內，你產生一道吸收護盾，吸收量為你所造成所有傷害的25%，且復仇之盾的傷害提高20%，其冷卻時間縮短75%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 在接下来的15秒内，你会生成一个吸收量为所造成伤害25%的护盾，且复仇者之盾的伤害提高20%，冷却时间缩短75%。
